title: Alabama joins forces with ICE in trucking immigration crackdown
description: Alabama Law Enforcement Agency officers have partnered with ICE to conduct multiple immigration enforcement operations targeting truck drivers.
content: A collaboration between the Alabama Law Enforcement Agency (ALEA) and U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) that began in October has resulted in 82 truck drivers being detained by ICE for i… [+2926 chars]
